the torrent, but you'd better do some external reading. In short, download
the torrent, copy the PGP sig from freetexthost, import my public key and 
verify the archive containing the album. (My public key will be hosted at
freetexthost dot com slash gvp1sg52ml for as long as that site remains
above water.) Only an authentic copy of this rip will return a good 
signature--discard any torrent that fails.
